overview: We took a trip to the most haunted city in Texas, Jefferson, TX to see for ourselves, IS IT HAUNTED? The first feature made by director Trenton Chappell. Joined by his parents, Rick and Summer Chappell, they take a week long trip to investigate the this famous town, that inspired the film "Poltergeist" by Steven Spielberg.
title: The Hauntings of Jefferson, Texas
